title: Firefighting Agencies Enlist AI to Spot Wildfires
sub_head: Startups are tapping AI technologies associated with facial recognition to identify potential outbreaks
body:
In the U.S. West, where every oak tree and vineyard double as potential fuel for the next conflagration, authorities are in a race to spot and respond to potential fire outbreaks before it is too late.
Wildfires, so far, appear to be winning.
The 2017 Tubbs Fire that burned through the California counties of Sonoma and Napa exploded from a...
